channel.title: SMUfood
channel.description: A single-page template for Jekyll based blogs (like what you'd use on github pages!)

item.title: team
item.description:
teamwork makes the dream work

Our team consists of three computer science students at SMU. We all share a passion for learning and building cool shit.

Samuel Hunter

Currently a Sophomore at SMU, Sam is responsible for designing, building and deploying the iOS application.

Conrad Henry Appel IV

Our funky fresh backend specialist bakes our stack with lots of love.

Gavin Pham

Gavin is the glue that holds the SMUfood phamily together. Oh, and heâ€™s also responsible for the API architecture and data mining.

item.title: App
item.description:
SMUfood Application

The SMUfood ios app is ~~coming soon~~ now available on the App store, where it will freely allow users to easily see when each restaurant is open.

item.title: home
item.description:
SMUfood!

SMUfood is an app that changes how you interact with campus dining at SMU. A 2014 Big iDeas grant winner, SMUfood is ~~a work in progress~~ now available on the App Store.
